action.action-desc: Mr. Nolan (for himself and Ms. Wilson of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide for limitations on duty hours for yardmaster employees, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Railroad Yardmaster Protection Act of 2017.

section.header: Limitations on duty hours of yardmaster employees

subsection.header: Limitations on duty hours of yardmaster employees
subsection.text: Section 21103 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading of such section, by inserting and yardmaster employees after train employees;
by inserting or yardmaster employee after train employee each place it appears; and
in subsection (e), by inserting or yardmaster after During a train.

subsection.text: Section 21101 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (3) by inserting a yardmaster employee, after dispatching service employee,; and
by adding at the end the following:
yardmaster employee means an individual responsible for supervising and coordinating the control of trains and engines operating within a rail yard.

subsection.text: The table of sections for chapter 211 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to section 21103 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: 21103. Limitations on duty hours of train employees and yardmaster employees.
